website_summaries.verdict: If Rex is your or your child's favorite character from Toy Story, this toy should be first on your list.
pros: Ideal for ages 3 and up, this Rex figure says more than 20 phrases from the Toy Story movies
He can also be posed in several different poses
Great for playing with other talking Toy Story toys
cons: A little pricey for a toy that is only 7" tall

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I thought this was the big rex toy and i paid around 52$, but it was a small one and it doesn't match the rest of the toy story collection wich are the exact movie replica At least a photo of the package would've helped with knowing which version is it
customer_reviews.author: Athar

customer_reviews.title: A hit for my little Toy Story fan!
customer_reviews.text: Rex has delighted my granddaughter! I love the size, which is big enough for little hands to stand up on her own. This is a well made toy that has been played with for hours. I know I will end up buying each toy from Toy Story 3, a set of the larger ones would have been nice. I will update this review if this product doesn't meet my expectations for durability. As an online shopper I rely heavily on reviews left by others when trying to decide what to buy so I try to leave useful reviews for those products that I feel strongly about. Please let me know if you find my review helpful. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my two year old grandson and he loves it ! I liked it because it is very sturdy and a size that is good for toddler hands. If your little ones are fans of the movie toy story I would definitely recommend this toy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as you might want him to be, but a good toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of three reviews I am leaving about the Amazon Exclusive line of Toy Story toys. I left 2 stars for Woody and Buzz each. This is the only one of the three I bought I am okay with, even like it. He is small, and my son complains, but otherwise, he's fine. He's definitely durable. His tail detaches like in the movie, and so does one of his back legs. He has a button on the back that makes him talk, he has the classic lines. Best one of the Amazon Exclusive bunch, especially since currently you can not get Rex from the Disney Store (otherwise I probably would)
customer_reviews.author: megan daniels

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: The toy is amazing and so colorful. Says many phrases from the movie with the original voice which makes it so much more fun. The size it not as big as the other Toy Story characters but not really as issues just a comment.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Davis

customer_reviews.title: Its good! but its “Not Big Rex Disney”
customer_reviews.text: It is not the big T-rex that Disney sells that matches all the other big sized characters. This T-rex is small and the tail does detach. I was bummed out when I opened the pckage to see a small T-rex when I thought it was the big one, but my daughter still loves it thats all that matters. Always look at reviews and photos before purchasing! If I had done that I would not have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Drewski

customer_reviews.title: This Rec was just like the movie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Toy story! This Rec was just like the movie, and has a lot of sayings.. She loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My twin boy and girl grandchildren loved this toy. I didn't get to see it before they received it for their birthdays and it was smaller than I anticipated. However, that may be because I am accustomed to the larger dinosaurs and I must have misinterpreted the picture. It is the perfect size for the 3 year old's to carry around and I love that it speaks so many phrases. It was a good choice and seems to be enjoyed by both boy and girl.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Tail falls off constantly - Very cheap - don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaur’s tail keeps coming off and it upsets my toddler who cried when it first happened and now comes to me to fix it every five minutes. Very cheap and smaller than the other toy story toys he has. I’d recommend the Disney toy story exclusive one over this lesser version.
customer_reviews.author: ObsidianLex

customer_reviews.title: Only speaks Spanish and is a lot smaller than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only speaks Spanish and is a lot smaller than the pictures depict. A photo of the toy in its box would have been appreciated for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Crothers

customer_reviews.title: hm childers
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 2 and fell in love with the original Toy Story Movie. He will sit so quiet on his bean bag and just stare and be so in tune with everything going on ... on the screen. His favorite is Rex. We go it for him for Christmas and he walk around with it pulling its tail off and laughing (so cute) and then he pushed the button and make him walk and "RAAWR" then my grandson starts to "RAAWR" and so yes get this toy it is worth the smiles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item!! It states in the description that it stands 12" tall. The item is actually smaller than a 16.9oz water bottle. Complete RIP off.
customer_reviews.author: flashd39

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy, well made, sounds just like the Rex in the movie, and very worth the price. My kids love him! It looks just as advertised. It’s not a big toy so look into the dimensions. Still it’s big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Josefina Manzo

customer_reviews.title: like size of the palm of your hand
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than what is shown, like size of the palm of your hand. Also the tail does not stay on, it keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: clausb

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: My child wanted the Toy Story cast so I bought this along with the others. All the other members of Toy Story are much bigger than this dinosaur so it is smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: NDM

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I was expected it to be but my grandson loved it
customer_reviews.author: Wondia Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love Rex
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. My three year old twins love this toy. I must admit, I buy the Toy Story toys because I love the characters as much as my kids do.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: tail won’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: The toy is good quality other than the fact that the tail does not stay on. So if you don’t mind chasing around for the tail 24/7 so your kids can play with her complete toy then go ahead and get it otherwise try to find an in tact toy.I wish there was a way to lock the tail and from falling off
customer_reviews.author: Dena otto

customer_reviews.title: Overall Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I expected. But perhaps I didn't read the measurements in the description correctly. Overall a sturdy toy with phrases to match the movie(s).
customer_reviews.author: Katie Santarem

customer_reviews.title: Cute Rex
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves Toy Story so of course he loved this. It doesnt say too many things, but it is cute and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: was kind of disappointed by this rex! he is too small to cost Over $20, what just because he talks ugh! what i wanted was the big one i didnt need the speaking Rex. at any rate my son loves him so i guess its alright.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The size deceiving for the price for starters. And it didn’t even work. Super disappointed as it was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Small dino!
customer_reviews.text: It was MUCH smaller than I expected. Ended up returning it without even taking it out of the package because it was not what we were needing or expected.
customer_reviews.author: xCHRIE

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: It is seen to be of good quality, but it is not the original product I was expecting, since all the original products were collected and this rex is very small
customer_reviews.author: Geovanny

customer_reviews.title: His favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: It's his favorite toy, do I really need to say more. Buy it and your child will never let go of it, without a tantrum at least.
customer_reviews.author: jason sparks

customer_reviews.title: SMALL TOY! Is not 12" standing up!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail and I'm very disappointed. The item is described to be 12" but that is only measuring from tail to head not from where it stands to the top of it's head. It's a small toy and for $20 it's a rip off! Very upset that it isn't as big as my son's other 12" dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Waldon

customer_reviews.title: a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Another addition to the kids toy story collection. One of them did pull out the arm the first day, but otherwise, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: crazybookladylover

customer_reviews.title: You can find it cheaper really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Paid too much Target has it for 22.99 really small bought for grandson gonna return it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Rawwwrrr!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Stinky, flexible pvc smell in lower tail piece, if you avoid offgassing like we do...other than that it's a great toy, my 4yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome McNeato

customer_reviews.title: Tail falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: This product does talk as promised but if you even drop him on the ground, his tail falls off and it is too hard for my 3 year old to put back on. I think it is pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Carold1976

customer_reviews.title: There are a ton of fun phrases. He seemed just about the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: There are a ton of fun phrases. He seemed just about the right size for playing. It hasn't broken after a few months of use, but the tail and tiny arms do seem a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: vanilla

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy toy! My son is 2.5 years old and after 2 months of hard play it's still intact! Also, my son LOVES all the this he says!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: her reaction is so funny. Tip
customer_reviews.text: I just received him & he’s fabulous! I keep pushing his button to talk to my puppy...her reaction is so funny. Tip: I added this to my list when he was over $25. I checked my list a few days later and the price dropped, he was $12.99. I bought him right away - I love using lists to manage price differences! I’m using him, Woody & Buzz in a series of photo shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Connie A.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for all of those Toy Story fans out there
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for all of those Toy Story fans out there! His voice sounds just like the animation character on film.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Strang

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and it's cute. But pretty expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Shipe

customer_reviews.title: Not so big
customer_reviews.text: They were serious when they added that it is perfect for toddlers. The tail came off within a week and it’s one of the smallest toys in my nephews toy story collection, he’s suppose to be the bigger but I guess it’ll do.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Returned Toy
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it was too small. I wanted the 12' Rex. Totally my fault for not reading the description. I give 5 stars because I liked it just wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keech

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Rex is very cute & has lots of phrases that crack us up! Before wrapping it in a present I unpackaged it so my son wasn’t traumatized about his tail being detached haha
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Fiorini

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Its a 7” toy so if you have regular size Woody or Buzz it looks funny. But it has lota of sayings and the voice is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Toy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it but on the arms and the feet’s the toes and fingers have Sharp edges on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: His arm popped off
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but his left arm came off after two days and since then it was hard to have it stay on until one day the arm completely fell off somewhere and now we have a one armed Rex .
customer_reviews.author: MelissaB

customer_reviews.title: This ended up being Smaller then wanted or thought: ...
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being Smaller then wanted or thought :( but also it is very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little one who is into Toy Story at the moment. Good size, cute packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Rex is a favorite toy.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Rex. He is smaller than I thought he'd be but she's happy with him.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as I expected - read dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as it appears - should have read the size in the description. My grandson will love it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Coni Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: So far a great toy and has lasted months without breaking which says a lot in my house. Be advised it's a smaller Rex, if you want the larger one go though Disney or a Disney store.
customer_reviews.author: chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger but my 4 year old son loves it! He talks to him all the time lol “so what are you gonna do now??”

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: this toy was a complete RIP OFF! It was way smaller than I expected! that's 50$ I'll never get back!

customer_reviews.title: Talking Rex From Toy Story
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Toy Story and has been collecting all the characters from the movie. He loves playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Up to you
customer_reviews.text: Really small toy, comes apart really easy, and doesnt stay together most of the time Talks which is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is the smaller one.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe we put it together incorrectly maybe we put did it right but the leg that you have to put in place will not stay attached to Rex.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hough

customer_reviews.title: he loves Rex and this toy is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My son is 2 and is obsessed with Toy Story, he loves Rex and this toy is perfect for him! He loves to mimic the sayings (especially the roar) and I think the size is just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: Not full size Rex
customer_reviews.text: Not The full size Rex. This Rex is part of a set made for toddlers three and under. Barely stands 6 inches tall. Wish the description would say that and or show pictures of the box for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C

customer_reviews.title: Rex is a HUGE hit with my 2 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: Rex is a HUGE hit with my 2 yr old grandson. He loves talking with Rex and carrying him around everywhere. Winner winner!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: He is smaller than I was expecting, but my son loves him still so it’s all good. My son is 2 and Rex has held up well being played with by him.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: it is super cute and speaks several phrases very clearly
customer_reviews.text: The toy was a little smaller than expected. However, it is super cute and speaks several phrases very clearly. My 3 yr old love it.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandson for Christmas. He loves it. Just the right size for him.

customer_reviews.title: He talks
customer_reviews.text: Love that he talks, we press the button often when we walk past him.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn F

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Arrives unassembled for some unknown reason. Then, when attempting to assemble it, the legs and tail won’t stay on. For the price, I’d expect much better. Sound and phrases are great, but it literally falls apart when you move it or touch it in any way. So disappointing!

customer_reviews.title: So fun but small
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this dinosaur but the post is misleading. It’s much smaller than the Rex at Disney Store. Check pictures before buying.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: One of my sons favorite toys! So cute! Great sound quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great but, one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great product, T-Rex says a lot of original quotes. Only disappointment is the tail pops out. I wish there was a way to screw it in tight. My son cry’s every time the tail pops out because he think T-Rex is hurt.

customer_reviews.title: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: But all the parts were there and the audio is great.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says. Although, fair warning- he comes with a detached leg. That caused a momentary panic attack for my son, lol. But all the parts were there and the audio is great.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay

customer_reviews.title: SiZe not as expected!

customer_reviews.title: good for a stocking stuffers for a larger stocking maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really small toy, good for a stocking stuffers for a larger stocking maybe a bit larger then your hand (womens) has great phrases. Really thought it would be larger

customer_reviews.title: Size was not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but very small... Did not expect to see such a small Rex when I opened the box. Doesn’t match the rest of my sons collection :( but still a nice addition nonetheless.

customer_reviews.title: The two year old loved it, small enough for her to handle no ...

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made

product_meta.title: Disney/Pixar Toy Story Talking Rex (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: Now your favorite DisneyPixar Toy Story characters really talk back! Dinosaur Rex speaks up to 20 of his classic phrases at the press of a button! Recreate favorite scenes as you hear real movie dialogue! Rex and all of the talking figures will delight fans and collectors with their iconic styling, big personality details, basic articulation and famous phrases. Comes in a “Try-Me” package so you can hear him in advance. Each figure sold separately, subject to availability. Requires 3 button cell batteries, included. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Favorite character from Disney/Pixar Toy Story really talks back
Movie inspired colors, styling and big personality details
Speaks up to 20 of his classic phrases
Collection includes Woody, Jessie, Buzz or Rex. Each figure sold separately, subject to availability
Basic articulation enables dynamic posing and play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars428 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
